item.description:
If you aren't a 9-5'er and want to enjoy a few miles in the morning on a weekday, this is a great opportunity! I think it would be nice to head from Inman down to Harvard and along the Charles for a bit and back. We can make a group decision on the distance - 3-6 miles could be good. I run 8-9 min/mile generally so others w/ that sort of pace would be good.
Hope you can join in!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the little park at the corner of Beacon/Cambridge/Hampshire Streets

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Wednesday morning run for us non 9-5'ers :)
